oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Geodomain WordNet ITA ENG V 1.0
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Frontini, Francesca
Del Gratta, Riccardo
Monachini, Monica
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Geographical Names
Named Entity
Concepts
Wordnet Structure
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Two domain wordnets containing a manual mapping between the concepts of the Geonames ontology (version 3.0) and two existing wordnets. Geodomain WordNet ENG V 1.0 maps the Geonames concepts onto Princeton WordNet 3.0 Geodomain WordNet ITA V 1.0 maps the Geonames concepts onto ItalWordnet; moreover the Geonames concept glosses are translated into Italian.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Istituto di Linguistica Computazionale “A. Zampolli” - Consiglio Nazionale delle Ricerche (ILC-CNR)
